experience.title: Full Stack Engineer

Apps made are now one of the most widely applied in the field of Industrial Automation with AI in Taiwan.

From the backend comprising of AI Model with various algorithms, data processing, database designing, to frontend user interface for industrial applications, providing client and intuitive, easy but powerful industrial applications.
